name: peakvox Escape Virus HD
description: This game is the DNA's battle for survival between the Virus in the micro-world.There is no rest and starting all over again if you got hit.Keep your eyes on the screen!!Also,it is compatible with the network ranking.Let's try to compete with the world users!Enjoy in five game modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 / Windows8 / Windows10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher. Athlon 64 or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB video memory, shader model 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 154 MB available space
